claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).
explanation: Header of a CDC Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report (MMWR) showing the title, volume, issue number, and date does not support the claim because the image only shows the report header and contains no information about Flublok, its production platform, or expression systems Note: Analysis limited by the image showing only the document header; no relevant text or figures related to the claim are visible
